description.narrative:
After first action plan supported by Agriterra in 2014, and the positive coooepration in this new partnership (see also project 6114), it is decided to continue supporting Imenti SACCO in 2015. Action plan is in line with objectives as stipulated in the new strategic plan, which was elaborated in 2014 with supprt of Agribusiness advisor.
Imenti SACCO continues to try to attract new members, in particular dairy farmers, but also coffee producers, albeit to a more limited extent.
As indicated, the action plan 2015 is in line with the objectives set by Imenti SACCO in its strategic plan. These include: • Recruit 1,000 new members • Training of Board of Directors • Comply to SASRA rules • Develop new loan products • Improve marketing • Decrease current loan defaults • Retain surplus to boost institutional capital to not less than 25%.
In order to satisfy dairy farmers' needs, in 2014 developed "Maziwa" loans (Maziwa = milk) needs to be uptaken. With regards to 2014, more focus will be on governance, and besides training of staff and board, we will continue with benchmarking activities with other SACCOs, as is has proven to be a very good way of learning and exchaning experiences.
Imenti wants to become a SACCO providing superior financial services to dairy farmers.
